name: Propulsion Intern
description: An internship involving the development of a modular analytical suite for comparison of components in a satellite propellant feed system undergoing transient start-up processes.

name: BA, MEng in Engineering
description: Specialisation in Aerothermal, Mechanical, Information and Bioengineering. Modules: 3A1/3, 3C5, 3E1, 3F1/2, 3G1, 4M12. Year 2: 79%, 1st Class, Official; Year 1: 75: 1st Class Equivalent, Unofficial.

name: Launch and Safety Officer
description: Negotiation with 10+ launch sites for the launch of a UK record-breaking 20km, 5kN hybrid rocket. Safety procedure regarding Nitrous Oxide pressure vessels for cold flow and hot fire testing.

name: Cooling Sub-Team Propulsion Engineer
description: A manufacturing-oriented design of a 10kN Nitrous Oxide-Isopyropyl Alcohol, after analysis of temperatures, stresses and material compatibility.

name: Lead Website Developer
description: A total redesign of the website as part of a new marketing strategy, built in Wordpress and complete with my own design, and Blender renders.

name: Engineering in Education Scheme Student
description: A project overseeing a 3-person team to validate high-temperature laser sensors in measurement of actuator displacement in jet engines.

name: Vice President & IIA Representative
institution: Staff Student Joint Council, Cambridge University Engineering Department
description: Formerly IB Representative. Responsible for collecting and relaying student opinion to senior professors within the department.

name: Research Student
institution: Division A: Energy, Fluid Mechanics and Turbomachinery, Cambridge University Engineering Department
description: A CFD research project with Professor R.S. Cant involving creating a standard test case library for stationary laminar hydrogen flame speeds for proprietary code, automated with Linux and Python.

name: Senior Physics Challenge Participant

description: 1-week selective course on understanding advanced problem solving in quantum mechanics.

name: GCSE and A-Level Student

name: Mentor
